subject: Test runtime scenario using junit
msgSnippet: Hi, Is it possible to test a runtime scenario using junit? For instance, similar to attaching an eclipse debugger to a running process, attach a junit test

Hi,
Is it possible to test a runtime scenario using junit? For instance, si=
milar to attaching an eclipse debugger to a running process, attach a junit=
 test suite to an already running JVM? 

The reason why I have this doubt i=
s because, I am making changes to a small part of a huge code base, but in =
order to test the small code change a lot of other objects have to be popul=
ated before invoking the test method. Also, attaching to a running process =
similar to eclipse debugger, would help me simulate run time scenarios and =
check if expected exceptions are thrown by the method being tested by Junit=
.

Please get back to me if my question is not clear.

Thank you

Regards
A=
nanth
